column4: ive got a question about a database: i want to organize my home banking and Budget Paper things in a database like mySQL - just because it sucks to do these things in different programms like gnucash and excel/Calc. thats why i switched to linux/ubuntu last week. So my question is: mySQL is very hard to learn (for me) is there any other database solution easy to use like just as a text file...
I dont' know if mysql is hard to learn for you as I don't know you, but it is a full relational datbase
i know, but mySQL is a littlebit to much for me- i just want a db - easy to use and safe
